__e: Didn't you just bury your husband yesterday?
Did you bury all your feeling for her. Or where you always like this.
I took that hard, but I buried it.
You know where the body's buried?
I buried it there so we could go home.
I took this off your father before I buried him.
I feel like he's trying to tell me we fucked up the night we buried him. -We didn't. -I'm in danger.
And my dad, you buried him, too, didn't you, Henry?
Some men, they took her and they killed her and they buried her.
Those who survived got rid of her and buried her as far away as possible.
When we buried her, I took your hand, but you pulled away from me.
Someone buried them a long time ago.
No, I took them all out of town, buried them.
Burying them, killing them, breaking one of them out of jail...
and to nobody else... because of what I did to you... I'd bury that... about five meters from the sheep pen... on the line to the house.
Which is why we buried it when we arrived.
How would they know I buried it?
